siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Collaborate without burnout. Replace back-to-back meetings with voice messaging groups. No calendars, no video chats, just back and forth voice messaging groups. Meet on your own time and take back your calendar.
blogPost.body: Collaborate without burnout. Replace back-to-back meetings with voice messaging groups. No calendars, no video chats, just back and forth voice messaging groups. Meet on your own time and take back your calendar.
blogPost.title: Yac Meet - Create and share async meeting links
blogPost.author: Justin Mitchell

localize.description: 协作无倦怠。用语音消息组取代背靠背的会议。没有日历，没有视频聊天，只有来回的语音消息组。在您自己的时间开会，收回您的日历。
localize.tagline: 创建和共享异步会议链接

localize.description: 協作無倦怠。用語音消息組取代背靠背的會議。沒有日曆，沒有視頻聊天，只有來回的語音消息組。在您自己的時間開會，收回您的日曆。
localize.tagline: 創建和共享異步會議鏈接

previous.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! ⠀ Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
previous.title: Branch 2.0 - Your space for work and play

localize.description: Branch 是您工作和娱乐的空间 ⠀ 通过协作和有趣的虚拟总部，让远程工作中缺少的偶然性、自发的对话、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新回归。
Branch 是您工作和娛樂的空間 ⠀ 通過協作和有趣的虛擬總部，讓遠程工作中缺少的偶然性、自發的對話、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新迴歸。

next.excerpt: A simple web app to procedurally generate random MIDI melodies that you can use royalty free in your own work.
next.title: Melody Generator - Randomly generated MIDI melodies you can use for free

localize.description: 一个简单的网络应用，程序化地生成随机的MIDI旋律，你可以在自己的作品中免费使用。
localize.tagline: 随机生成的MIDI旋律，您可以免费使用。

localize.description: 一個簡單的網絡應用，程序化地生成隨機的MIDI旋律，你可以在自己的作品中免費使用。
localize.tagline: 隨機生成的MIDI旋律，您可以免費使用。
